ugathkama pragnyawen wenwanuye sadacharayeni.prachina adhyapana wyuhaya sakaswi pawathiye danuma samanga buddhiya ha sadacharaya thulin ugathkama labena seya.oolpot,warnan,lindsi,bandura ha maklingar wani adhyapana manowidyagnyayin saradharma adhyapanaya pilibandawa unandu wiya.batahira adhyapana widya muladharmawalada purna paurusha sanwardhanayak sandaha saradharma awashyabawa sandahanya.

wirawansha amathyawarayage sahaya sandaha sha්ri lanka waraya adhikariye sha්ri la.ni.pa wruththiya samithiye samajikayan 1000kata wadi pirisak ragena ema watalimata sahabhagi wanalesa janadhipathiwaraya waraya niyojya amathya rohitha abegunawardhana mahathatada niyoga kota atha.mehidi thanapathi karyalaye kisidu wideshikayekuta hinsa nowana paridith, thanapathi karyalaye depolawalata kisidu alabha haniyak nowana ayurinuth katayuthu karana lesa janadhipathirawaya eki amathiwarun dedenatama awadharanaya kara atha.amarikanu thanapathi karyalaya watalime meheyuma heta (27) paswaru 03 ta aarambha wimata niyamitha athara eeta adala arakshaka katayuthu kollupitiya polisiyata ha nawika hamudawata pawara thibe.mita amatharawa amarikawata ha jagath sanwidhanayata erehiwa sama nagarayakama ‘janapawura’ namin wirodhathawaliyak sanwidhanaya kara athi athara eewahi sambandhikarana katayuthu adala polis sthana wetha pawara thibe.
